statements: UPDATE financial_reports SET taxable_income = 50000, tax_rate = 20 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_reports SET tax_rate = 15, report_date = '2022-07-01' WHERE report_id = 2;
UPDATE financial_reports SET tax_rate = 10.5, taxable_income = taxable_income + 5000 WHERE report_id = 100
UPDATE financial_reports SET taxable_income = 75000.75, report_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE report_id = 200
UPDATE financial_reports SET report_name = 'Q1 Financial Report', report_date = '2022-04-01' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_planning SET plan_description = 'Quarterly Budget Update', end_date = '2022-06-30', start_date = '2022-04-01' WHERE plan_id = 2;
UPDATE financial_reports SET report_name = 'Quarterly Report Q3 2022', report_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_planning SET plan_description = 'Detailed financial strategy for Q4 2022', end_date = '2022-12-31', start_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE plan_id = 2;
UPDATE financial_reports SET profit = 1500 WHERE sales_amount > 2000
UPDATE tax_reports SET tax_paid = 500, tax_return = 300 WHERE tax_deductible < 200
UPDATE financial_reports SET sales_amount = 10000.50, expenses_amount = 5000.75, profit = 4500.75;
UPDATE tax_reports SET tax_paid = 1200.00, tax_deductible = 300.50, tax_return = 400.25;
UPDATE financial_reports SET report_name = 'Q2 Financial Report' WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE tax_documents SET document_data = '{"status": "approved"}' WHERE document_id = 2005;
UPDATE financial_reports SET report_name = 'Q1 Financial Report', report_data = '{"revenue": 500000, "expenses": 300000}' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE tax_documents SET document_date = '2022-04-15', document_data = '{"tax_rate": 0.25}' WHERE document_id = 3;
UPDATE financial_reports SET report_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE tax_information SET tax_amount = 1500.75, tax_type = 'Income Tax' WHERE tax_id = 3;
UPDATE financial_reports SET report_date = '2022-07-15', report_data = '{"status": "completed"}' WHERE report_id = 1001
UPDATE report_lines SET line_description = 'Updated Description', line_amount = 1500.00 WHERE line_id = 2001
